name: windows-audio-output
title: Windows Audio Output
description: Switch the active audio output device on Windows

commands.name: switch-audio-output
commands.title: Switch Audio Output
commands.subtitle: Windows Audio Output
commands.description: Sets the active audio output device on Windows

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: xHugo21
